alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 14 at 11:59PM MST until February 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect from 11 AM to 6 PM MST for gusty winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 230...233 and 237, which includes Baca County and the lower elevations of Las Animas County... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 6 PM MST TUESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 230...233 AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 230...233 and 237. * Winds...Southwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Western Las Animas County Including Trinidad and Thatcher
